speaking.topic: COMMITTEE ON ENERGY AND NATURAL RESOURCES
speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I wish to inform the Senate and the Public that the committee on Energy and Natural Resources will hold a hearing during the session of the Senate on Wednesday, January 10, 2007 at 9:45 a.m. in room SD-G50 of the Dirksen Building.
The purpose of the hearing is to receive testimony on the global oil balance and its implications for U.S. economic and national security.
